actions.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Public Works + Transportation. H. Rept. 103-70.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 33.
Mr. Traficant moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: To name the United States courthouse in Benton, Illinois, the "James L. Foreman Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. courthouse at 301 West Main Street, Benton, Illinois, as the James L. Foreman United States Courthouse.

titles.title: To name the United States courthouse in Benton, Illinois, the "James L. Foreman Courthouse".
